feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 07 February 2023
